metadata.title: CVE-2019-3890 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: It was discovered evolution-ews before 3.31.3 does not check the validityof SSL certificates. An attacker could abuse this flaw to get confidentialinformation by tricking the user into connecting to a fake server withoutthe user noticing the difference.

criterions.comment: evolution-ews package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
